title: Demon In Me
description: Layla survived years of addiction and abuse, burying the traumas which nearly destroyed her. She escaped Hell, slapped a tourniquet on her toxic memories, and found a measure of peace as a drummer in Las Vegas. Finally, she's able move on . . . until sheâ€™s called home to Connecticut at the behest of her dying mother.Back to Blackpool, where her estranged family awaits alongside enemies she yearns to forget. The trip awakens her inner demons, voices who warn that history may repeat itself. A new cycle of violence begins, echoing a past Layla almost died to escape. The voices urge her to fight, reminding her of wrongs that were never made right. But if she gives in, she may lose both her sanity and her soul . . . a steep price to save people who vanished when she needed them the most. Layla's reached a crossroads, a choice between an insatiable thirst for vengeance or forgiveness for those who hurt her. But some crimes are unforgivable, and some wounds refuse to be forgotten.
author: Jennifer  Soucy
